title: Re-connection error...
body: I was playing a preseason game when my internet accidentally got disconnected, so i changed my connection to my mobile data to avoid any more issues and it wouldn't let me reconnect, so i connected back to my modem and still wouldn't connect? maybe this is a bug with the new patch 6.22? have a look riot!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you experienced this issue since?
